attributes.visState: {"title":"[Schwachstellen][Visualisierung] - Schwachstellenverlauf - Kritisches Risiko","type":"timelion","aggs":[],"params":{"expression":".es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=9.0 AND risk_score:<=10').label(\"Aktuell\"),\n.es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=9.0 AND risk_score:<=10',offset=-1w).label(\"-1 Woche Offset\"),\n.es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=9.0 AND risk_score:<=10').subtract(.es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=9.0 AND risk_score:<=10',offset=-1w)).label(\"Differenz\").lines(steps=3,fill=2,width=1)","interval":"auto"}}

attributes.title: [Schwachstellen][Visualisierung] - Schwachstellenverlauf - Hohes Risiko
attributes.visState: {"title":"[Schwachstellen][Visualisierung] - Schwachstellenverlauf - Hohes Risiko","type":"timelion","aggs":[],"params":{"expression":".es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=7.0 AND risk_score:<9.0').label(\"Aktuell\"),.es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=7.0 AND risk_score:<9.0',offset=-1w).label(\"-1 Woche Offset\"),.es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul,index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=7.0 AND risk_score:<9.0').subtract(.es(metric=cardinality:uniqueVul, index='logstash-vulnwhisperer-*',q='risk_score:>=7.0 AND risk_score:<9.0',offset=-1w)).label(\"Differenz\").lines(steps=3,fill=2,width=1)","interval":"auto"}}
